lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bonds for Texaco Inc units hardly traded during the day following the weekend news that the company filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in another twist to its long running dispute with Pennzoil Co, dealers added.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Deutsche Bank Finance NV Curacao became the first of three issuers in the Australian dollar market during the morning with a 100 mln dlr bond due 1990 paying 14-1/8 pct and priced at 100-1/4 pct.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The dollar straight sector of the eurobond market ended lower after another nervous day's trading, with many operators keeping to the sidelines ahead of tomorrow's U.
